fi.aapzu.pentago.logic

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.aapzu.pentago.logic.Board

  • public class Board
extends Object
    The board of the Pentago. Contains Tiles and Marbles.
    Author:
    Aapeli

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board()
      Calls the constructor with the default values 2 as sideLength and 3 as tileSideLength.
      Board(int sideLength, int tileSideLength)
      Creates the Board, and the Tiles in it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board(int sideLength,
             int tileSideLength)
        Creates the Board, and the Tiles in it.
        Parameters:
        sideLength - the amount of the Tiles per side
        tileSideLength - the amount of the Marbles per side of a Tile

      • Board

        public Board()
        Calls the constructor with the default values 2 as sideLength and 3 as tileSideLength.

    • Method Detail

      • getTile

        public Tile getTile(int tileX,
                    int tileY)
        Gives the Tile in the given coordinates. Throws IllegalArgumentException if the coordinates are invalid.
        Parameters:
        tileX - the X coordinate of the Tile
        tileY - the Y coordinate of the Tile
        Returns:
        the Tile

      • validateTileCoordinates

        public boolean validateTileCoordinates(int tileX,
                                       int tileY)
        Validates the given tile coordinates.
        Parameters:
        tileX - x coordinate of the tile
        tileY - y coordinate of the tile
        Returns:
        true if coordinates are valid, otherwise false

      • getTileByCoordinates

        public Tile getTileByCoordinates(int marbleX,
                                 int marbleY)
        Return the Tile, in which the given coordinates for a Marble are.
        Parameters:
        marbleX - the X coordinate of the Marble
        marbleY - the Y coordinate of the Marble
        Returns:
        the Tile

      • addMarble

        public boolean addMarble(Marble marble,
                         int x,
                         int y)
        Adds a Marble to the Board to the given place.
        Parameters:
        marble - the Marble to be set to the Board.
        x - the X coordinate
        y - the Y coordinate
        Returns:
        true if succeeded, otherwise false

      • getMarble

        public Marble getMarble(int x,
                        int y)
        Gives the Marble in the given place. Returns null if the place is empty. Throws IllegalArgumentException if the coordinates are invalid.
        Parameters:
        x - the X coordinate
        y - the Y coordinate
        Returns:
        the Marble

      • removeMarble

        public Marble removeMarble(int x,
                           int y)
        Removes and gives the Marble in the given place. Returns null if the place is empty. Throws IllegalArgumentException if the coordinates are invalid.
        Parameters:
        x - the X coordinate
        y - the Y coordinate
        Returns:
        the removed Marble
